Get your joints moving and your muscles burning with this strenght building routine. This routine will target your core, arms and legs. Short and straight to the point, you can do it with no equipment at all. Juan Roman Riquelme MUSCLE AND STRENGHT By John 15 min Abs 20 Previous Pause Play Next List Mode Detail Mode TIP OF THE DAY\nNo matter how bad your stomach is telling you to go for candy over healthy food, try to stay away from sweets.
